Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I recently discovered KSP about 5 days ago and fell in love immediately. I also wanted to learn the art of streaming so I figured why not learn two things at once. Everyone is invited to view my stream at http://www.twitch.tv/senthysis. Feedback, suggestions, and constructive criticism is welcome..... ("constructive" See what I did thar?) I generally start streaming around 5 or 6pm EST.

Please stop by and let me know what you think.

Thanks,

Senthysis
